title: Drawing, "Banquet of the Gods", ca. 1810
medium: Pen and brown ink over traces of graphite on cream laid paper
inscribed: Inscribed inside tondo: l'olimpo convito delli Dei
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Circular design contain octagon. Hebe pours wine in bowl raised by Jupiter who together with Juno, is shown in right foreground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Banquet of the Gods", ca. 1810.
ca. 1810. Pen and brown ink over traces of graphite on cream laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3269.
